author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-5830: Fix some missing/assert codec checks to throw CorruptIndexException

author: kkolinko
msg: Do not perform wrapper mapping if context is being reloaded,
as such mapping is useless and may fail unexpectedly.
Let mapper know that context is being reloaded.
Ignore removeWrapper(), removeWelcomeFile() calls when context is being reloaded,
During undeploy the context should have already been unregistered.
During reload the context will be re-registered via addContextVersion().
